SELECT e.*, a.activity_name, b.base_name FROM yx_evaluate_info e LEFT JOIN yx_base_info b ON e.base_id = b.id LEFT JOIN yx_activity a ON a.id = e.activity_id ${ew.sqlSegment}
SELECT FLOOR(score) score,COUNT(score) as scores FROM yx_evaluate_info GROUP BY FLOOR(score)
